1.5.1.name: wordpress/google-bot-bling
1.5.1.description:
The tool is still in early development, your feedback is appreciated!

The Google Bot Bling Plugin is designed to help website owners know when Google has indexed their website by sending an email to the website owner each time the Google Bot crawls their website.
